scripts.init: cd src && bower install && cd .. && cd functions && npm install && cd .. && npm install
scripts.dev:fb: npm run build && firebase serve --only hosting
scripts.dev:fb+: npm run build:prod && firebase serve --only hosting,functions
scripts.dev:bs: npm run build:dev && node /Users/mschultz/pwa-build dev --config config/main.js --bs
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && firebase deploy --only hosting, functions
scripts.deploy:host: npm run build:prod && firebase deploy --only hosting
